tasks.task: Attaching pup tent to the back of a pick-up truck bed.
subtasks: Open rear gate of pick-up truck.
Remove tie-down straps from previous attachment.
Position pup tent beside pick-up truck.
Reach into truck bed and adjust position to secure tent.
Attach tent to truck bed using new straps or bungee cords.

tasks.task: Securing supplies to the roof of a pick-up truck.
subtasks: Identify supplies needing securement.
Load supplies onto roof rack.
Check roof straps and adjust tension.
Adjust position of supplies for stability.

tasks.task: Positioning assortment of items on a farm.
subtasks: Examine items to be placed.
Approach designated area on farm.
Distribute items across the field or area.
Ensure even spacing or placement as needed.

tasks.task: Operating a feed mixer to mix farm animal feed.
subtasks: Assemble components of feed mixer.
Measure and sort feed components.
Load measured components into mixer.
Activate mixer to combine feeds.
Monitor mixing process for even distribution.

tasks.task: Checking irrigation system on a farm.
subtasks: Walk through the fields to inspect sprinklers.
Look for missing or clogged sprinkler heads.
Check water flow at different points in the system.
Test the overall efficiency of water distribution.

tasks.task: Using a fish scaler to de-scale fish.
subtasks: Lay fish on a clean surface.
Position fish scaler against the fish scales.
Apply even pressure while scraping off scales.
Rinse fish with water to remove scale debris.

tasks.task: Utilizing a meat saw on a farm.
subtasks: Secure meat item to hold-down mechanism.
Align saw with the cut line on the meat.
Begin cutting slowly and steadily along the line.
Verify the cut is straight and even.

tasks.task: Raising a cattle gate.
subtasks: Approach the gate mechanism.
Apply force to lift the gate handle or chain.
Ensure the gate opens smoothly without obstruction.

tasks.task: Attaching a tailgate to a flatbed truck.
subtasks: Align tailgate with truck bed edges.
Use hinges to connect tailgate to truck.
Attach latches or straps for closure.

tasks.task: Checking the oil level in a piece of farm equipment.
subtasks: Locate the oil fill and dipstick on the equipment.
Use dipstick to check current oil level.
Compare oil level to the minimum mark.
Add oil if necessary to bring it up to proper level.

tasks.task: Planting trees in an orchard.
subtasks: Select the right type and size of tree.
Dig a hole deep enough for root ball.
Place tree into the hole, ensuring proper depth.
Backfill with soil and tamp down around the roots.
Water the newly planted tree to settle the soil.

tasks.task: Discing a field for planting.
subtasks: Position the disc harrow behind the tractor.
Engage the disc blades and set depth control.
Drive the tractor over the field, covering the entire area.
Check for thorough incorporation of residue and soil.

tasks.task: Cutting wood for firewood using a chain saw.
subtasks: Identify and select logs or branches for cutting.
Position the chain saw for safe and effective cutting.
Cut branches to desired length using the chain saw.
Separate pieces of wood after cutting.
Secure wood pieces if needed for transportation.

tasks.task: Pouring concrete for a farm structure.
subtasks: Mix concrete in a mixer truck or bucket.
Transport concrete to pouring area.
Pour concrete into forms, ensuring even coverage.
Smooth the surface with a trowel or screeding tool.
Allow concrete to set according to curing time.

tasks.task: Electric water pump maintenance on a farm.
subtasks: Identify components of the water pump system.
Shut off the power supply to the pump.
Drain any remaining water from the system.
Disassemble the pump to access internal parts.
Clean or replace worn-out parts as necessary.

tasks.task: Checking fencing posts for stability.
subtasks: Walk along the perimeter of the fence.
Inspect posts for leaning or weak spots.
Measure the tilt or movement of posts.
Consider replacing posts that are unstable.

tasks.task: Attaching wheels to a vehicle.
subtasks: Identify the vehicle and the wheel size needed.
Loosen the lug nuts with a wrench.
Jack up the vehicle to remove the flat tire.
Rotate the wheel onto the hub.
Tighten lug nuts in a star pattern.
Lower the vehicle and recheck lug nut tightness.

tasks.task: Fueling a farm implement with diesel.
subtasks: Locate the fuel tank on the implement.
Open the fuel tank cap or filler door.
Insert the fuel nozzle and connect to the fueling port.
Measure the amount of fuel to add.
Slowly fill the tank until it reaches the desired level.
Check for any fuel spills and clean up if necessary.

tasks.task: Installing a water meter on a farm’s irrigation system.
subtasks: Turn off the water flow to the system.
Identify the location for the water meter.
Dig a hole to accommodate the meter and fittings.
Assemble the meter and appropriate pipes.
Connect the meter to the irrigation system.
Check for leaks or proper flow after installation.

tasks.task: Unclogging a clogged irrigation pipe.
subtasks: Isolate the affected section of the pipe.
Disconnect the pipe segments at the joints.
Locate and remove the blockage using a brush or probe.
Reconnect the pipe and check for proper flow.

tasks.task: Applying fertilizer to crops using a broadcast spreader.
subtasks: Load the spreader with fertilizer.
Adjust the spread pattern for the field width.
Drive the tractor pulling the spreader over the field.
Monitor the spreading pattern for even coverage.

tasks.task: Tending to a field of orchids.
subtasks: Inspect plants for signs of disease or pests.
Prune dead or diseased foliage.
Water the plants ensuring even distribution.
Monitor the growth and health of the orchids.
